span.span: Represents the exclusive C14N XML canonicalization transform for a digital signature as defined by the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C), with comments.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类表示包含注释的独占 C14N XML 规范化转换。The class represents the exclusive C14N XML canonicalization transform with comments. 此类与 类相似，后者允许签名者使用 XML 文档的规范形式创建摘要。This class is similar to the class, which allows a signer to create a digest using the canonical form of an XML document. 但是， 类会排除规范化子文档中的上级上下文。However, the class excludes ancestor context from a canonicalized subdocument. 需要规范化 xml 子文档，使其独立于其 xml 上下文时，可使用类。Use the class when you need to canonicalize an XML subdocument so that it is independent from its XML context. 例如，在复杂的通信协议内使用已签名 XML 的应用程序（如 Web 服务）通常需要以这种方式规范化 XML。For example, applications such as Web services that use signed XML within complex communication protocols often need to canonicalize XML in this manner. 此类应用程序通常在各种动态构造的元素内信封 XML，这可能会显著更改文档并导致 XML 签名验证失败。Such applications often envelop XML within various dynamically constructed elements, which can substantially change the document and cause XML signature verification to fail. 类通过从规范子文档中排除此类上级上下文来解决此问题。The class solves this problem by excluding such ancestor context from the canonical subdocument. 请注意，不能直接创建规范化转换类的新实例。Note that you cannot directly create a new instance of a canonicalization transform class. 若要指定规范化转换，请将描述转换的统一资源标识符 (URI) 传递给 属性，该属性可从属性进行访问 。To specify a canonicalization transform, pass the Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) that describes the transform to the property, which is accessible from the property. 若要获取对规范化转换的引用，请使用属性 ，该属性可从属性进行访问 。To acquire a reference to the canonicalization transform, use the property, which is accessible from the property. 描述类的 URI 由 字段定义。The URI that describes the class is defined by the field. 有关独占 C14N 转换的详细信息，请参阅 W3C 网站中提供的 [XMLDSIG 规范](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/)。For more information about the exclusive C14N transform, see the [XMLDSIG specification](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/), which is available from the W3C website. 规范化算法是在 [W3C 规范 XML 规范](https://www.w3.org/TR/2002/REC-xml-exc-c14n-20020718/)中定义的。The canonicalization algorithm is defined in the [W3C Canonical XML specification](https://www.w3.org/TR/2002/REC-xml-exc-c14n-20020718/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用类对 XML 文档进行签名和验证 。The following code example shows how to sign and verify an XML document using the class. 此示例将创建一个信封签名。This example creates an envelope signature. remarks.format: ## Remarks `inclusiveNamespacesPrefixList`参数包含以空白分隔的命名空间前缀列表，以使用标准规范化算法而不是专用规范化算法来规范化。The `inclusiveNamespacesPrefixList` parameter contains a white-space delimited list of namespace prefixes to canonicalize using the standard canonicalization algorithm rather than the exclusive canonicalization algorithm. 若要指定没有前缀的默认命名空间，请传递特殊前缀 "#default"。To specify the default namespace, which does not have a prefix, pass the special prefix "#default".
